workExperience.description: Utilized Python and SQL for customer segmentation analysis using K-Means and PCA. Automated weekly reporting processes. Developed Tableau dashboards in support of marketing strategies.
Analyzed business data for retail clients to provide technical consulting. Formulated data-driven solutions and delivered actionable insights for client projects.
Contributed to product lifecycle management for a mobile app. Collected user feedback, defined requirements, and coordinated development and launch activities.

projectExperience.description: Led a team in analyzing customer behavior and sales trends. Identified key sales drivers and proposed optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform.
Developed a personal finance app with real-time stock data APIs and budgeting tools. Improved UI/UX for enhanced user engagement.

education.description: Coursework in Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering Principles.
